paramagpy.fit¶

Functions

cantor_pairing(a, b) Map two integers to a single integer.
clean_indices(indices) Uniquely map a list of integers to their smallest size.
ensemble_average(atoms, *values)
extract_ccr(data) Extract values required for CCR calculations
extract_csa(data) Extract CSA tensors from atoms
extract_pcs(data) Extract values required for PCS calculations
extract_pre(data) Extract values required for PRE calculations
extract_rdc(data) Extract values required for RDC calculations
nlr_fit_metal_from_ccr(initMetals, ccrs[, …]) Fit deltaChi tensor to CCR values using non-linear regression.
nlr_fit_metal_from_pcs(initMetals, pcss[, …]) Fit deltaChi tensor to PCS values using non-linear regression.
nlr_fit_metal_from_pre(initMetals, pres[, …]) Fit deltaChi tensor to PRE values using non-linear regression.
nlr_fit_metal_from_rdc(metal, rdc[, params, …]) Fit deltaChi tensor to RDC values using non-linear regression.
pcs_fit_error_bootstrap(initMetals, pcss, …)
pcs_fit_error_monte_carlo(initMetals, pcss, …)
qfactor(experiment, calculated[, sumIndices]) Calculate the Q-factor to judge tensor fit quality
sphere_grid(origin, radius, points) Make a grid of cartesian points within a sphere
svd_calc_metal_from_pcs(pos, pcs, idx, errors) Solve PCS equation by single value decomposition.
svd_calc_metal_from_pcs_offset(pos, pcs, …) Solve PCS equation by single value decomposition with offset.
svd_calc_metal_from_rdc(vec, …) Solve RDC equation by single value decomposition.
svd_fit_metal_from_rdc(metal, rdc[, sumIndices]) Fit deltaChi tensor to RDC values using SVD algorithm.
svd_gridsearch_fit_metal_from_pcs(metals, pcss) Fit deltaChi tensor to PCS values using Single Value Decomposition over a grid of points in a sphere.
unique_pairing(a, b) Bijectively map two integers to a single integer.
